categories.name: Limited Editions
categories.description: Here you’ll find rare and/or seasonal coffees, to give a special aroma to special moments.

categories.name: Reviving Origins
categories.description: With the Reviving Origins range, you can seasonally enjoy amazing coffees from unique origins that were almost lost due to conflicts or natural disasters, but which we managed to recover.

categories.name: Ispirazione Italiana
categories.description: Embark on an intense journey, with your Nespresso capsule, through the regions where coffee is an art, with 7 coffees and 2 decaffeinatos inspired by the tradition of Italian roasting.

categories.name: Master Origins
categories.description: From each of these origins and the hands of master craftsmen, all made with care. Explore the Master Origins range and discover peculiar techniques and unique terroirs, in your cup.

categories.name: Barista Creations
categories.description: Whether it's a cappuccino, latte, iced coffee or even a filter coffee, with these Nespresso coffees it's never been easier to awaken the Barista that lives in you.

categories.name: World Explorations
categories.description: A travel through aromas with a stopover in your cup. The World Explorations range allows you to discover (and taste!) the coffee cultures from the most iconic cities in the world.

categories.name: The Original Collection
categories.description: Espresso is in our name and probably on all your days. Discover your favorites among the different aromas, textures and intensities.
